subject: Baseball
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Marion, known as the Octopus for his long arms and ability to gobble up ground balls, was an All-Star every season from 1943 to 1950.
snippet: Mr. Marion, known as the Octopus for his long arms and ability to gobble up ground balls, was an All-Star every season from 1943 to 1950.
